mapper.select: select user_id,num_using from active_reservation where cafe_no = #{cafe_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM active_reservation WHERE cafe_no = #{cafe_no} AND num_using = #{num_using}
SELECT c.name, a.num_using FROM study_cafe c INNER JOIN active_reservation a ON c.cafe_no = a.cafe_no WHERE a.user_id = #{user_id} AND a.category = #{category}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (USER_ID, CAFE_NO, CATEGORY, NUM_USING, START_TIME, END_TIME, DURATION) SELECT USER_ID, CAFE_NO, CATEGORY, NUM_USING, START_TIME, SYSDATE, ROUND((SYSDATE - START_TIME) * 24 * 60) FROM active_reservation WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND category = #{category}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM active_reservation WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND category = #{category}
